Further studies on the release model fitting of the buckwheat flavonoids nanoemulsion were performed to understand the release pattern. Various dynamic models were fitted to the release curve, and the correlation coefficients ( R 2), residual sum of squares (RSS), and Akaike information criterion (AIC) were calculated ( Table
2 ). The drug release model was closer to Weibull ( R 2 = 0.9947, RSS = 18.6194, AIC = 33.2369) and Ritger–Peppas ( R 2 = 0.9723, RSS = 113.4027, AIC = 51.3095) models.
